Comment: Excellent service! My purchase (Invoice 98) was perfect. Obrigado!

The 'Fast As a Shark' track was corrupted (Invoice 100). Please issue a refund.
Woodstock Discos loves your selection. Keep the classics coming!
Very happy with my purchase for Riotur. Fast and easy.
Good service. Had a small issue with billing on Invoice 15, but it was resolved quickly by Jane.
Your collection of U2 is great. Happy with my purchase.

Enjoyed the Audioslave album. Will be back for more.
Big fan of the live Led Zeppelin tracks. Great quality.
I am furious. I was overcharged on my last invoice (Invoice 20) and my support rep, Jane Peacock, was not helpful.

Good classical selection. The download was fast.

The classical tracks are fine, but the website is confusing.
